医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
当气温升高时，医疗风险也会随之增加。医生和护士应该更多地谈论高温吗？今年夏天开始时，一封重要的电子邮件出现在波士顿北部一小群医护人员的收件箱中。它警告说，当地气温将上升至华氏80度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/When-temps-rise-so-do-medical-risks-Should-doctors-and-nurses-talk-more-about-heat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/When-temps-rise-so-do-medical-risks-Should-doctors-and-nurses-talk-more-about-heat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af7ec85e-6e0b-41c3-98ab-5da142437d97 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 08:03:33 -0400 When temps rise, so do medical risks. Should doctors and nurses talk more about heat?
生物标志物揭示了对 COVID-19 后综合征变异性的见解研究人员对 2019 年冠状病毒病后综合症患者的前瞻性观察队列进行了研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Biomarkers-unveil-insights-into-post-COVID-19-syndrome-variability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Biomarkers-unveil-insights-into-post-COVID-19-syndrome-variability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=085e7343-5256-40d8-a8c4-926247eda631 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 08:03:00 -0400 Biomarkers unveil insights into post-COVID-19 syndrome variability
活动人士滥用联邦数据虚假声称新冠疫苗导致 676,000 人死亡Facebook 上分享的一篇博客文章声称，covid-19 疫苗已导致约 676,000 名美国人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Activist-misuses-federal-data-to-make-false-claim-that-c​​ovid-vaccines-killed-676000.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Activist-misuses-federal-data-to-make-false-claim-that-c​​ovid-vaccines-killed-676000.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=566edc5f-6a8e-4d6e-b1cf-588012c1d6dc Fri, 01 Sep 2023 08:02:15 -0400 Activist misuses federal data to make false claim that covid vaccines killed 676,000

每日无糖汽水和早期阿斯巴甜摄入量与男性自闭症之间的联系母亲在怀孕期间每日饮用无糖汽水或阿斯巴甜与后代自闭症风险之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Link- Between-daily-diet-soda-and-aspartame-intake-in-early-life-with-autism-in-males.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Link- Between-daily-diet-soda-and-aspartame-intake-in-early-life-with-autism-in-males.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94b87339-ca5a-43dd-84f4-2e52b913ef76 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 06:29:00 -0400 Link between daily diet soda and aspartame intake in early life with autism in males
TherageniX 和诺丁汉大学获得 99.5 万英镑的创新英国拨款，用于开发用于骨再生的粉末基因疗法来自英国创新药物制造转型计划的资金支持细胞内药物输送的创新技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/TherageniX-and-University-of-Nottingham-awarded-c2a3995K-Innovate-UK-grant-to-develop-powdered-gene-therapy-for-bone-再生.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/TherageniX-and-University-of-Nottingham-awarded-c2a3995K-Innovate-UK-grant-to-develop-powdered-gene-therapy-for-bone-再生.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d08c8a6f-75a2-4bca-994e-7731d9e0efd1 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 04:54:00 -0400 TherageniX and University of Nottingham awarded £995K Innovate UK grant to develop powdered gene therapy for bone regeneration
调整节奏，抵抗阿尔茨海默病：间歇性禁食在对抗阿尔茨海默病神经退行性变中的作用News Medical 采访了加州大学圣地亚哥分校神经科学副教授 Paula Desplats 博士。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Aligning-Rhythms-Defying-Alzheimers-Intermittent-Fastings-Role-in-Combating-Alzheimers-Disease-Neurode Generation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Aligning-Rhythms-Defying-Alzheimers-Intermittent-Fastings-Role-in-Combating-Alzheimers-Disease-Neurode Generation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a13c2e90-cb80-46ff-82c7-2c1ee3bb5041 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 04:44:00 -0400 Aligning Rhythms, Defying Alzheimer's: Intermittent Fasting's Role in Combating Alzheimer's Disease Neurodegeneration
食用色彩缤纷的水果和蔬菜可以改善妊娠糖尿病的管理吗？一篇新论文探讨了食用彩色水果和蔬菜（CFV）的饮食影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Can-the-conspiration-of-colorful-fruits-and-vegetables-improve-the-management-of-gestational-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Can-the-conspiration-of-colorful-fruits-and-vegetables-improve-the-management-of-gestational-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5945bbb9-71fd-4967-bec9-a032e32c69ef Fri, 01 Sep 2023 04:28:00 -0400 Can the consumption of colorful fruits and vegetables improve the management of gestational diabetes?
低剂量阿司匹林可使老年人患 2 型糖尿病的风险降低 15%将于今年在德国汉堡举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会（10 月 2 日至 6 日）上公布的新研究表明，65 岁和 65 岁的老年人使用低剂量（每天 100 毫克）阿司匹林年龄越大，患 2 型糖尿病的风险降低 15%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Low-dose-aspirin-linked-to-1525-lower-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Low-dose-aspirin-linked-to-1525-lower-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54d441ab-d3b2-4ddf-8f0b-542c3c12256f Thu, 31 Aug 2023 23:16:08 -0400 Low-dose aspirin linked to 15% lower risk of type 2 diabetes in older adults
研究表明重做 TAVR 手术安全有效Cedars-Sinai 的研究人员是带球囊扩张瓣膜的经导管主动脉瓣置换术 (TAVR) 创新和使用的领导者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Redo-TAVR-procedures-are-safe-and- effective-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Redo-TAVR-procedures-are-safe-and- effective-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57dd244d-259b-4dd1-ba8a-8befa6205536 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 23:11:34 -0400 Redo TAVR procedures are safe and effective, study shows
